name: Zachary Gameiro
tagline: Computing Science & Biochemistry Student | Systems & Applied ML
bio: I'm a Computing Science and Biochemistry student at SFU, focused on systems and applied ML. I like building things end-to-end—from embedded hardware to pipelines and full-stack apps—and I'm always up for a tough problem. When I'm not coding, I'm usually outdoors or traveling.

languages.label: French
languages.tooltip: I did French immersion, and my mother is a French teacher

languages.label: Portuguese
languages.tooltip: My family is Portuguese; it was my first baby language

languages.label: Spanish
languages.tooltip: Very similar to Portuguese—I'm conversationally comfortable. Done lots of traveling.

education.program: Joint major in Computing Science and Microbiology & Biochemistry (MBB).
education.summary: Joint major in Computing Science + MBB, focused on systems, applied ML, and biomedical computing.
education.details: Pursuing a BSc joint major in Computing Science and Microbiology & Biochemistry at SFU in Burnaby. Core work includes data structures, algorithms, databases, discrete math, probability/statistics, and biomedical computing.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.summary: Completed one semester in the BSc Computer Science program before continuing studies at SFU.
education.details: Completed one semester of Computer Science coursework at MacEwan University in Edmonton, Alberta, then transitioned to SFU.

education.summary: Completed high school in Edmonton with a strong math and science foundation.
education.details: Graduated from Archbishop MacDonald in Edmonton, where I built the academic foundation that led into computing science and life sciences.

experience.title: Retail Associate
experience.description: Handled regulated products, inventory tracking, and customer verification. Operated under strict compliance and cash-handling procedures.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Managed online vehicle sales and customer correspondence. Customer-facing sales and contracts in a high-volume dealership.

experience.title: Construction Labourer
experience.description: Performed physically demanding work including scaffolding, concrete, and site setup. Worked long shifts in safety-critical environments requiring reliability and teamwork.

experience.title: Lifeguard & Swim Instructor
experience.description: Ensured public safety and emergency response in regulated aquatic facilities. Instructed children and adults; maintained certifications and safety compliance.

experience.title: Grounds Crew
experience.description: Maintained course grounds and facilities under early-morning and time-critical schedules. Operated equipment and followed safety procedures in outdoor work environments.
